ygData.subject: Wish Orc Pawns carried more money
ygData.msgSnippet: So far the only orcs i don t want to mess with for now are the orc centurians... i did fine with them when my sword was ok...i think i either sold it by
ygData.messageBody:
So far the only orcs i don't want to mess with
for now are the orc centurians... i did fine with
them when my sword was ok...i think i either sold it
by mistake or stood out in the rain too long (if
thats possible)...i'm still doing the really stupid
sh*t like forgetting to shut off auto attack when i
aproach a merchant but am really good at locating my
corpse now ..lol. I saw a bandit attacked by someone
with diff color letters over their head and then he
yelled for help which i did'nt help cause he started
it..also found alot of people will take my kills away from
me if they get the chance so now i don't hesitate
looting if i see a corpse lying on the ground with no one
around it. Also found that the long swords cost 15 p ...
i think i have 8 :(<br>and have no clue about
finding quests. Still getting use to the language
too...what do they mean by train to (where ever) alot of
people leaving to same town? Hope to run into some of
you someday... i'm thinking about creating a new
charactor and calling her clueless. Bye for now.
